function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Airborne transmission of deadly diseases such as tuberculosis","Impact":"Spread of deadly diseases in the built environment","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation and air quality, implementing infection control measures","Technologies":"Air purifiers, ventilation systems, UV-C disinfection","People":"Residents, workers, visitors in built environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Unhygienic living conditions and dense living spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and infection","Mitigation":"Slum clearance, provision of green spaces, improved street layout","Technologies":"Urban planning, green space design, public health interventions","People":"Residents in densely populated areas","Owner":"City planners, policymakers, community organizations"},{"Description":"Obsession with hygiene by design leading to unintended consequences","Impact":"Overemphasis on hygiene at the expense of other important factors in urban design","Mitigation":"Balancing hygiene considerations with other aspects of urban design, promoting holistic approach to city planning","Technologies":"Urban design principles, interdisciplinary collaboration in city planning","People":"Urban designers, architects, policymakers","Owner":"City planning authorities, urban design organizations"}]}
